about_the_game:
"Lucky One" is a visual novel for adults only. A young slob named Fred enrolls in the Department of Linguistics, where he struggles to find a girlfriend, being the only guy on the stream.

A young slob named Fred finally enters university. He finds himself in the faculty of his dreams - not because he is in love with his major, but because there are almost no guys on campus: only beautiful girls. Fred's dream of a personal harem has never been so close to reality.
But things aren't going according to plan: the girls aren't in a hurry to fall for his charm and swagger, and Fred will have to be more careful if he wants to get a girl.
Three girls to be exact.
Fred has a crush on the bossy and unapproachable Beatrice, the quiet and literature-loving Rachel, and the mischievous and energetic Sandy.
No one promised that it will be easy: each of them needs a different approach.
Fred will have to not only win the hearts of beauties, but also to rethink his views on life.

Game Features:

Exciting world of university life, touching relationships of Fred with Beatrice, Rachel and Sandy.
Each character has a unique personality, adding depth to the story.
The atmospheric soundtrack immerses you in the atmosphere of the story.
Unexpected twists and turns: The game promises exciting plot twists, keeping players interested.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters showing in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

name: Lucky One

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
